name: Silver Tale
description: Take a fantastical journey across the kingdom. Solve quests, collect rare artifacts, build upgrades, and even craft new items in this innovative new match-3 experience!
minimum_requirements: OS: WinXP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX version: 9.0 or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 340 MB available space
